course.subject: FINA
course.name: Asset-Liability Portfolio Management
course.description: New sound asset-liability management is critical to the success of institutional portfolio management.  Topics include (1) new global movements in ALM; (2) balancing liability needs vs. asset selections; (3) dealing with "long tail liabilities" with asset constraints; (4) legal and market price competition considerations in ALM; (5) credit risks and "pass throughs"; (6) currency risks and options; (7) cash flow characteristics and duration connotation; (8) return on capital - accounting vs. economic; (9) use of derivatives and structured products in ALM; (10) ALM tracking and control.
